CustomField.formula: CASE( Transaction_Event_Code__c, "T0000", "General: received payment", "T1107", "Payment refund, initiated by merchant", "T0400", "General withdrawal from PayPal account", "T0006", "PayPal Checkout APIs", "T0013", "Donation payment", "T0002", "Subscription payment. Either payment sent or payment received.", "Un-Classified: Please lookup here to classify this transaction: https://developer.paypal.com/docs/transaction-search/transaction-event-codes/" )
CustomField.label: Transaction Classification
